main.metaContent: Explore museums, galleries, aquariums, zoos and theme parks around the world with virtual tours.
main.name: Name

welcome.text: You can select a place from the map or the list and start your virtual tour. You can also use filters to limit your search by place names, countries or types.

about.metaContent: Explore museums, galleries, aquariums, zoos and theme parks around the world with virtual tours.
about.aboutText1: Explore museums, galleries, aquariums, zoos and theme parks around the world with virtual tours.
about.aboutText2: If you have any suggestions or you know a good virtual place, please let us know.
